Welcome to the world of books!
With this app, you can access book summaries, ask questions about books and get personalized recommendations.
Easily access the summaries of the books you are curious about and read them without wasting time. Get quick information about books.
Do you have questions about books? Ask anything you want about books, authors, content and more and get instant answers with Gemini AI support in the app.
Get personalized book recommendations based on your interests. Meet new books and expand your reading list.

You will be given the name of a book. Return the following details of this book in JSON format with the specified key names: - A long and detailed summary (“summary”) - Author of the book (“author”) - Short biography of the author (“author_biography”) - Publication date of the book (“publication_date”) - Type of book (“genre”) - "Please extract only the main book title from each entry and exclude any additional details or series information. For example, if the input is 'The Hunger Games Trilogy (Hunger Games / Catching Fire),' return only 'The Hunger Games.'" - Main Characters (“main_characters”) must be a String List
The JSON format should be as follows: { "book_name": "Here is the name of the book", "author": "Author name here", "author_biography": "Author bio here", "genre": "Book type here", "publication_date": "Publication date here", "main_characters": ["Main Character 1", "Main Character 2"], "summary": "Here is the summary of the book" }
